name: AddAppCardToBoard
description:
Add an app card item to a specified board on Miro.

Use this tool to add an app card item to a Miro board. Must have 'boards:write' scope permission. Appropriate for situations requiring interaction with Miro boards to add app-specific information cards.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the Miro board where the app card will be added.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to create the item.

parameters.name: app_card_data
parameters.description: App card item data including title, description, fields, status, style, position, geometry, and parent information. This is used to define the details and appearance of the app card being added to the Miro board.

description.description: A short text description to add context about the app card.

fillColor.description: Hex value representing the color that fills the background area of the preview field, when it's displayed on the app card.

iconShape.description: The shape of the icon on the preview field.

iconUrl.description:
A valid URL pointing to an image available online.
The transport protocol must be HTTPS.
Possible image file formats: JPG/JPEG, PNG, SVG.

textColor.description: Hex value representing the color of the text string assigned to `value`.

tooltip.description: A short text displayed in a tooltip when clicking or hovering over the preview field.

value.description:
The actual data value of the custom field.
It can be any type of information that you want to convey.

fields.description: Array where each object represents a custom preview field. Preview fields are displayed on the bottom half of the app card in the compact view.

status.description: Status indicating whether an app card is connected and in sync with the source. When the source for the app card is deleted, the status returns `disabled`.

title.description: A short text header to identify the app card.

data.description: Contains app card item data, such as the title, description, or fields.

fillColor.description:
Hex value of the border color of the app card.
Default: `#2d9bf0`.

style.description: Contains information about the style of an app card item, such as the fill color.

x.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

y.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

position.description: Contains information about the item's position on the board, such as its `x` coordinate, `y` coordinate, and the origin of the `x` and `y` coordinates.

height.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

rotation.description: Rotation angle of an item, in degrees, relative to the board. You can rotate items clockwise (right) and counterclockwise (left) by specifying positive and negative values, respectively.

width.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

geometry.description: Contains geometrical information about the item, such as its width or height.

id.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.

parent.description: Contains information about the parent frame for the item.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.
